name: Yasmin Morgan
title: Amorphous Butterfly
media: ml5.js Implementation of poseNet and charRNN Machine Learning Models
artworkHTML: Two entities converse with each other, independent of human contact or interference. A speculation on machine relationships and 'Artificial Intimacy'. The two AIâ€™s are abstract entities that morph and animate as they talk, their scrolling conversation feeding back into each other.
